description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=2/3. In Star Cross, a SciFi-Fantasy RPG, follow the story of Riel Gevant and others in an adventure that spans several worlds, each with their own unique feel.  Estimated Gameplay:  8+ hours.
